title: Remap new Emote wheel?
body:
Ok, so I understand how to configure the new emote wheel .. and I know it's binded to "T" by default.
However, I already use "T" binded to something else .. so want to bind this new emote thing somewhere else ..
but I can't find where to do that ?

replies.body: You can rebind it under the communication section of your hotkeys settings.

Thanks for the assist Lew!

This is correct, but you won't find the option for that keybind in a custom or practice game right now I don't believe. You'll need to adjust that keybind once you're in a normal game.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YpLu7nNs,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-12T01:30:08.386+0000)
>
> Thanks for the assist Lew!
> 
> This is correct, but you won't find the option for that keybind in a custom or practice game right now I don't believe. You'll need to adjust that keybind once you're in a normal game.

You can also do it on the client screen if you click the settings button at the top (the gear) and go into Hotkeys.
